item.title: Sugarcane
item.description: Sugarcane is a billing and provisioning system for VPS based on Proxmox hypervisor. It featured: Prepaid credit system, Hourly billing, Vouchers support, Przelewy24 payment gateway support, VPS managment console (start, stop, restart, VNC), SSH key managment, NAT VPS deployment, Reverse proxy manager, Email notifications, Password reset feature, Admin panel
item.content:
Sugarcane is a billing and provisioning system for VPS based on Proxmox hypervisor.
It featured:

  • Prepaid credit system,
  • Hourly billing,
  • Vouchers support,
  • Przelewy24 payment gateway support,
  • VPS managment console (start, stop, restart, VNC),
  • SSH key managment,
  • NAT VPS deployment,
  • Reverse proxy manager,
  • Email notifications,
  • Password reset feature,
  • Admin panel
